fields.title: Salmon Sushi
fields.content:
200g sushi-grade salmon (thinly sliced)
1 cup sushi rice
1 tbsp rice vinegar
1/2 tbsp sugar
1/4 tsp salt

Instructions:
Cook sushi rice according to package instructions.
Mix rice vinegar, sugar, and salt, then stir into the cooked rice. Let it cool.
Wet your hands, take a small amount of rice, and shape it into an oval.
Place a slice of salmon on top, pressing gently.
Serve with wasabi and soy sauce.

fields.title: Sirloin Steak
fields.content:
1 sirloin steak (250g)
1 tbsp olive oil
1 tsp salt
1/2 tsp black pepper

Instructions:
Season the steak with salt and pepper. Let it rest for 10 minutes.
Heat olive oil in a pan over high heat.
Sear the steak for about 2-3 minutes on each side (for medium-rare).
Add butter, garlic, and rosemary. Baste the steak for 1 minute.
Remove from heat and let it rest for 5 minutes before serving.

fields.title: Creamy Corn Soup
fields.content:
1 cup corn kernels (fresh or canned)
2 cups milk
1 cup chicken broth
1 tbsp butter
1 tbsp all-purpose flour
1/2 onion (finely chopped)
1/2 tsp salt
1/4 tsp black pepper

Melt butter in a pot over medium heat, then add onions and saut√© until soft.
Stir in flour and cook for 1 minute.
Gradually add chicken broth and milk, stirring continuously.
Add corn, salt, and pepper, then simmer for 10 minutes.
Use a blender to puree the soup until smooth.
Serve hot with optional toppings like croutons or chopped parsley.

fields.title: Mapo Tofu
fields.content:
Ingredients:
400g firm tofu (cubed)
200g ground pork
2 tbsp vegetable oil
2 cloves garlic (minced)

Instructions:
Heat oil in a pan over medium heat, then add Sichuan peppercorns and stir-fry until fragrant. Remove the peppercorns.
Add garlic, ginger, and doubanjiang, stir-fry for 30 seconds.
Add ground pork and cook until browned.

fields.title: Simple Hamburger
fields.content:
1 pound (450g) ground beef
1 teaspoon salt
1/2 teaspoon black pepper
1/2 teaspoon garlic powder (optional)
4 hamburger buns
4 slices of cheese (optional)
1 tablespoon butter (for toasting buns)
Lettuce, tomato, onion (sliced)
Ketchup, mustard, mayonnaise (to taste)

fields.title: Simple Vegetarian Salad
fields.content:
2 cups lettuce (chopped)
1/2 cup cherry tomatoes (halved)
1/2 cucumber (sliced)
1/4 cup red bell pepper (chopped)
1/4 cup carrots (shredded)
1/4 cup red onion (thinly sliced)
1/4 cup corn (cooked or canned)
1/4 cup chickpeas (cooked or canned)
1/4 cup feta cheese (optional)
2 tablespoons olive oil
1 tablespoon lemon juice
1 teaspoon honey or maple syrup (optional)
Salt and black pepper (to taste)
